summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the wastewater system of Seattle Public Utilities; authorizing purchase of the parcels of land located at 118 30th Avenue East, 122 30th Avenue East, and 1XX 30th Avenue East, in the Madison Valley neighborhood of Seattle, amending the 2005-2010 Adopted Capital Improvement Program and increasing an appropriation to Seattle Public Utilities in the 2005 budget with respect to this acquisition.
